files.patch:
@@ -262,3 +262,4 @@ - *

The resulting channel will be in blocking mode and will not be - * buffered; it will simply redirect its I/O operations to the given stream. - * Closing the channel will in turn cause the stream to be closed.

+ *

The resulting channel will not be buffered; it will simply redirect + * its I/O operations to the given stream. Reading from the resulting + * channel will read from the input stream hence might block. Closing the + * channel will in turn cause the stream to be closed.

@@ -269,1 +270,1 @@ - * @return A new readable byte channel in blocking mode + * @return A new readable byte channel
